channel.title: Stuck on ideas for new script?
channel.description:
hi this is for people that are stuck on ideas of what script to make some try out a script for a runes maker... say start at bank to get the ess in the bank (put ess in first slot of the bank), have to wear a tiara of the runes you wont to make to make it faster, have it for no bank pin because when you put in your pin once you dont have to do it again do you untill logged out, set how many ess you got to tell the script to stop after all of the ess are used.
is that ok for a discription of a good script to make?

item.title: Stuck on ideas for new script?
item.dc:creator: @m3l33_man m3l33 man
item.description:
@m3l33_man wrote:

sorry im little stupid like that i fort it went well with the tital but now you say it back to me i understand i will remember that for next time cheers and good luck with the script

item.title: Stuck on ideas for new script?

item.description:
@aznph8playa wrote:

m3l33 man:

is that ok for a discription of a good script to make?

Hey! That was a great script description. Infact I might give it a shot, just one problem. You posted it in the First Scripts Section Next time, post things similar to this in the Script Requests section =o)
